column3: 2015) send sympathy gifts send sympathy card montgomery twp. charles clarence geherty
column8: 2015 at princeton care center. born in princeton to the late thomas and anna geherty
column9: he was a life-long resident. charles served proudly in the u. s. army during peace-time of the korean conflict from 1955-1961 as corporal and was a self-employed electrician. he was an avid fisherman and a member of the american legion posts #76 and #148. he was predeceased by a brother
column12: and allen. surviving are his loving children
column13: june geherty and ronald geherty. his cherished grandchildren
column18: donna g. geherty and jane gehertry
column20: thomas geherty and elizabeth niper and several nieces and nephews. visitation will be friday from 10:30am to 11:30 am at the kimble funeral home
column23: followed by interment at brigadier general w. c. doyle veterans memorial cemetery
column26: memorial contributions may be made in his name to the cancer treatment centers of america at eastern regional medical center
